overview: The co-founders of the Rocket Beans look back on their careers in this stage show performend on Mai 2019 inside the St. Pauli Theater in Hamburg. The B.E.A.N.S (Budi, Etienne, Arno, Nils, Simon) recapitulate their time at "GIGA Games", to "MTV's Game One", to their own 24 Hour Live-Stream Station in their typically unprofessional way. The anecdotes of the four and others of their creative circle are presented with photographs , videos & other time capsule like findings. All of this in a cozy atmosphere, couch to couch, in front of an audience and a carpet  found three days ago in their basement.
title: An Eve With Beans
